content.processed:
If it is necessary for you to communicate through written form, you can use one of the services listed below.

The lines are divided by regions.

After opening the link to the website, you enter your telephone number and the operators of the given line will contact you, during the call it is necessary to leave the website open, there will be an online transcript of the call.

Prague

  • Helpline for the elderly and those in need, online transcription is provided on weekdays from 9 am to 6 pm, FREE OF CHARGE

Services provided: Up-to-date information on the epidemic, the possibility of ordering medicine, food, hygiene and medical supplies, provide assistance and important contacts

Pilsen Region

  • Regional Hygiene Station of the Pilsen Region, online transcription is provided on working days from 9 am to 6 pm
  • Regional Office of the Pilsen Region, online transcription is provided on working days from 9 am to 6 pm

South-Moravian region 

  • Regional Hygiene Station of the South Moravian Region, online transcription is provided on working days from 9 am to 6 pm
  • Regional Office of the South Moravian Region, online transcription service is available: MON, WED from 9 am to 5 pm; TUE, THU from 9 am to 4 pm; FRI from 9 am to 2 pm

Liberec region

  • Regional Hygiene Station of the Liberec Region, on-line call transcription is offered MON, WED from 9 am to 5 pm; TUE, THU from 9 am to 3 pm; FRI from 9 am to 2:30 pm   

Pardubice Region

  • Regional Hygiene Station of the Pardubice Region, online transcription is provided on working days from 9 am to 6 pm
  • Regional Office of the Pardubice Region, online transcription service is available: MON, WED from 9 am to 5 pm; TUE, THU, FRI from 9 am to 2:30 pm 

Hradec Králové region

  • Regional Office of the Hradec Králové Region, online transcription service is available: MON, WED from 9 am to 5 pm; TUE, THU from 9 am to 3:30 pm; FRI from 9 am to 2 pm

Olomouc region

  • Information helpline for COVID-19, online transcription is provided on weekdays from 9 am to 6 pm.
  • Regional Office of the Olomouc Region, online transcription is provided on working days from 8 am to 3 pm

Central Bohemian Region

  • Regional Office of the Central Bohemian Region, online transcription is provided on working days from 9 am to 6 pm

National

  • Labor Office of the Czech Republic, online transcription is provided on working days from 9 am to 6 pm

 

In case you need immediate medical assistance, use the "Záchranka" application, which allows communication via SMS messages.
